description:
Harrowing as the world may seem, you can always awaken to a new tomorrow...

Sixteen songs ranging the spectrum of life's experiences await you in this DLC! Awaken Eto and Luna, and join them along with Vita as you face life head on!

This is DLC for the base game Arcaea. No progression in the base game is required beforehand—you will have access to several songs from this DLC right away, and be able to unlock others as soon as you like! In addition, all content is permanent once purchased.

Songs included in this pack:
- "Cosmica" by Nhato
- "Ascent" by TANUKI
- "Live Fast Die Young" by anubasu-anubasu
- "Redolent Shape" by Sanaas
- "γuarδina" by Aoi
- "Head BONK Ache" by saaa ft. MC iwata Bros.
- "μ" by Frums
- "PICO-Pico-Translation!" by t+pazolite,ななひら,Cranky,Pico*
- "NEO WINGS" by SOUND HOLIC feat. Nana Takahashi
- "Kissing Lucifer" by ETIA.
- "Macrocosmic Modulation" by JAKAZiD
- "Evening in Scarlet" by Freezer feat. 妃莓
- "INTERNET OVERDOSE" by Aiobahn feat. KOTOKO
- "PUPA" by モリモリあつし
- "goldenslaughterer" by zts
- "lastendconductor" by zts

Partners included in this pack:
- Vita (with story)
Partner Awakenings included with this pack:
- Eto Awakening
- Luna Awakening
name: Shared Time + Memory Archive Bundle
